chinese: Look, Gary!
english: 瞧,Gary!

chinese: That policeman's waving to you.
english: 那个警察正朝你挥手呢.

chinese: He wants you to stop.
english: 他想要你停下来.

chinese: Where do you think you are?
english: 你认为你现在是在哪儿?

chinese: On a race track?
english: 在赛车道上吗?

chinese: You must have been driving at seventy miles an hour.
english: 你刚才一定是以每小时70英里的速度开车.

chinese: I can't have been.
english: 我不可能开得那么快的.

chinese: I was doing eighty when I overtook you.
english: 我是以每小时80英里的速度超过你的.

chinese: Didn't you see the speed limit?
english: 难道你没看见限速牌吗?

chinese: I'm afraid I didn't, officer.
english: 我恐怕我没有看见,警官.

chinese: I must have been dreaming.
english: 我一定思想开小差了.

chinese: He wasn't dreaming, officer.
english: 警官,他思想没有开小差.

chinese: I was telling him to drive slowly.
english: 我刚才正告诉他开慢点.

chinese: That's why I didn't see the sign.
english: 所以我才没看见那牌子.

chinese: Let me see your driving licence.
english: 让我看一看你的驾驶执照.

chinese: I won't charge you this time.
english: 这次我就不罚你款了.

chinese: But you'd better not do it again!
english: 但你最好不要再犯.

chinese: Thank you. I'll certainly be more careful.
english: 谢谢您.我以后一定会多加注意.

chinese: I told you to drive slowly, Gary.
english: Gary,我刚才叫你开慢点吧.

chinese: You always tell me to drive slowly, darling.
english: 你总是叫我开慢点,亲爱的.

chinese: Well, next time you'd better take my advice!
english: Well,下次你最听从我的劝告!
